settings.html: This is The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 Mobile Workstation—an exemplary mobile PACS workstation crafted for the precision and efficiency demands of the medical field, particularly suited for radiologists. This workstation combines robust processing power, advanced graphics, and high-speed storage in a sleek, durable package designed to handle the rigors of healthcare environments.

settings.title: Portable Diagnostic Imaging Workstation for Professionals
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 delivers robust performance, ensuring radiologists can handle extensive medical imaging workloads with ease. Its advanced processors and high-speed memory allow for rapid processing of complex diagnostic images. With the ability to manage large datasets and run multiple demanding applications simultaneously, this workstation is an ideal choice for high-stakes medical environments where precision and efficiency are paramount. The ZBook Fury 16 G9 also offers exceptional reliability and durability, making it a trusted tool for professionals who require consistent, top-tier performance under pressure.

settings.title: DICOM Calibrated with PerfectLUM
settings.description: PerfectLum is designed to optimize the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9’s high brightness IPS displays, ensuring they adhere to medical imaging standards like DICOM for precise grayscale accuracy. This compliance is crucial for accurate medical diagnostics, as it guarantees that grayscale images are displayed with the necessary detail and clarity. Additionally, PerfectLum maintains the 100% DCI-P3 color gamut of the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9, which is essential for accurate color representation in radiological work. By ensuring both grayscale precision and full color gamut accuracy, PerfectLum enhances the display's reliability for medical imaging, providing professionals with the clarity and color fidelity required for effective diagnostics and analysis.

settings.title: High-Performance Processors for Radiologists
settings.description:
The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9, powered by the 12th Gen Intel Core i9-12950HX, delivers up to 5.0 GHz Turbo Boost, 16 cores, and 24 threads, making it ideal for radiologists working with complex imaging software. This processor efficiently handles large medical images, enabling faster rendering of MRI and CT scans, and improved multitasking. Hyper-Threading Technology optimizes performance, reducing delays and enhancing workflow efficiency, which is crucial in time-sensitive environments.

The Intel Core i7-12800HX offers similar performance with up to 4.8 GHz Turbo Boost, 16 cores, and 24 threads, making it a more cost-effective option without sacrificing power. Both processors ensure smooth, reliable performance for medical imaging, helping radiologists work faster and more accurately.

settings.title: Triple Monitor Support for Enhanced Diagnostic Precision
settings.description: The HP Fury 16 G9 allows radiologists to connect up to three external monitors simultaneously, creating a vast and organized workspace without the need for an HP dock or adapters. This setup enables the concurrent viewing of multiple images, scans, and patient data without the constant need to switch between screens. With triple monitor support, radiologists can display different imaging modalities—such as CT, MRI, and X-rays—side by side, ensuring comprehensive and detailed analysis. This configuration not only enhances workflow efficiency but also improves diagnostic accuracy by keeping essential references and tools readily accessible. The extensive screen real estate minimizes errors and streamlines the diagnostic process, ultimately supporting a more effective and precise approach to patient care.

settings.title: DICOM Calibrated with PerfectLUM
settings.description: PerfectLum optimizes the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9’s IPS displays to meet DICOM standards, ensuring precise grayscale accuracy and 100% DCI-P3 color gamut for reliable medical diagnostics.

settings.title: Rapid DDR5 Memory for High-Demand Tasks
settings.description: With support for up to 128GB DDR5-4800 RAM, the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 offers rapid data access and high bandwidth necessary for managing large imaging files and extensive medical records. This ensures that healthcare professionals can work efficiently without experiencing lag or delays.

settings.title: Superior Performance with High-Capacity NVMe SSDs
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 Mobile Workstation supports storage configurations up to 12TB NVMe SSD. The included 1TB NVMe SSD offers lightning-fast data access with sequential read speeds up to 3,500 MB/s and write speeds up to 3,000 MB/s1. This high-speed SSD technology ensures quick boot times and rapid file transfers, crucial for maintaining workflow efficiency in medical settings. This robust storage solution allows radiologists to access and process large datasets swiftly, enabling timely and accurate diagnostics.

settings.title: Effortless Travel: Lightweight Solutions for Radiologists
settings.description: Weighing just 5 lbs, the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 is easy to take on the go, ensuring radiologists have mobility without compromising performance.

settings.title: High-Fidelity Diagnostics with NVIDIA Graphics Cards
settings.content:
The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 comes equipped with a versatile range of graphics options, tailored to meet the diagnostic needs of radiologists who require precision and detail in medical imaging. The workstation offers integrated Intel Iris X Graphics for standard visual tasks and a series of high-performance NVIDIA GPUs to handle more demanding imaging applications:

  • NVIDIA RTX™ A1000 (4GB GDDR6): A compact, cost-effective option for general diagnostic tasks and basic 3D rendering.
  • NVIDIA RTX™ A2000 (8GB GDDR6): Provides enhanced capabilities for detailed scans and 3D modeling.
  • NVIDIA RTX™ A3000 (12GB GDDR6): Ideal for advanced diagnostic imaging and virtual simulations.
  • NVIDIA RTX™ A4500 (16GB GDDR6): Supports high-resolution, multi-frame radiographs and complex reconstructions.
  • NVIDIA RTX™ A5500 (16GB GDDR6): Offers top-tier performance for AI-enhanced imaging and large data set processing.

These GPUs support advanced visual tasks required in radiology, including high-definition decoding and DirectX 12, and are capable of managing multiple high-resolution displays when connected via HP Thunderbolt Dock G2. This is essential for radiologists who require precision in viewing diagnostic images across several monitors. The ECC feature in the higher-end RTX models further ensures data integrity, which is crucial for maintaining accuracy in diagnoses. With this comprehensive GPU setup, the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 is equipped to meet the demanding and precision-critical needs of modern radiological practices.

settings.title: Specialized Aspect Ratio for Clear Diagnostic Imaging
settings.content:
The 16:10 aspect ratio of the HP ZBook Fury 16 G10 Mobile Radiology Workstation provides 11% more vertical content than a standard 16:9 display, essential for radiologists who need to view more of the image with less scrolling. This improvement helps maintain diagnostic integrity by ensuring vital details are always visible, reducing the need to minimize program menus or toolbars.

The pixel density on the 16-inch screen with a 16:10 aspect ratio surpasses that of a typical 17-inch screen with a 16:9 aspect ratio, delivering sharper, more detailed images crucial for accurate diagnosis and analysis.

Key Benefits:

  • Enhanced Vertical Space: Shows more vertical content, ideal for detailed diagnostic images.
  • Improved Workflow: Reduces scrolling, allowing radiologists to focus on image analysis.
  • Comprehensive Image Display: Ensures critical details are visible simultaneously.
  • Higher Pixel Density: Offers superior image clarity compared to a 17-inch display, enhancing diagnostic accuracy.

settings.title: Eye-Saving Anti-Glare Display with Low Blue Light for Prolonged Work
settings.description: The HP Fury 16 G9 features a 16-inch anti-glare, matte low blue-light IPS LCD screen with 450 cd/m² brightness, ideal for radiologists viewing detailed images without eye strain.

settings.title: Reliable Connectivity Anywhere with WiFi 6 and 4G LTE
settings.description: The HP Fury 16 G9 offers WiFi 6 and 4G LTE for fast, reliable internet access, ensuring seamless connectivity anytime and anywhere for professionals on the go.

settings.title: Enhanced Communication and Data Transfer with Bluetooth 5.3
settings.description: Bluetooth 5.3 in the HP Fury 16 G9 ensures ultra-low latency, enabling real-time connectivity with medical devices for timely diagnostics and patient care.

settings.title: Eye-Saving Anti-Glare Display with Low Blue Light for Prolonged Work
settings.description: The HP Fury 16 G9 features a 16-inch anti-glare, matte low blue-light IPS LCD screen with 450 cd/m² brightness, ideal for radiologists viewing detailed images without eye strain.

settings.title: Built-In Ethernet Port for Secure  and Fast Wired Connections
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9’s built-in RJ-45 Ethernet port provides reliable Gigabit Ethernet, crucial for radiologists handling large imaging files and patient data.

settings.title: Reliable and Sustained Battery Life for High-Demand Professional Workflows
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 provides 10 hours of battery life under moderate usage and 5 hours under heavy load.

settings.title: Quick-Charge Technology for Minimal Downtime
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 charges to 50% in under 30 minutes, ensuring quick power-ups for busy professionals.

settings.title: DICOM Calibrated with PerfectLUM
settings.description: PerfectLum optimizes the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9’s IPS displays to meet DICOM standards, ensuring precise grayscale accuracy and 100% DCI-P3 color gamut for reliable medical diagnostics.

settings.title: Smart Card and SD Card: Comprehensive Access Solutions
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 includes a Smart Card Reader and SD Card slot, enhancing security and expanding storage options

settings.title: Biometric Fingerprint Reader for Enhanced Data Protection
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 features a Fingerprint Reader, providing secure and convenient biometric authentication.

settings.title: Effortless Travel: Lightweight Solutions for Radiologists
settings.description: Weighing just 5 lbs, the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 is easy to take on the go, ensuring radiologists have mobility without compromising performance.

settings.title: Comprehensive 112-Key Numeric Keypad for Enhanced Data Entry
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 features a full numeric keypad with 112 keys, enhancing productivity and data entry efficiency.

settings.title: Illuminated Backlit Keyboard for Enhanced Visibility in Any Environment
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9’s backlit keyboard ensures comfortable typing in low-light conditions, enhancing productivity and visibility.

settings.title: Practical Spill-Resistant Keyboard for Busy Medical Environments
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9’s spill-resistant keyboard is designed to protect against accidental liquid spills, enhancing durability and reliability.

settings.title: Secure and Convenient Access with Infrared Camera and Windows Hello
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 is equipped with an Infrared Camera that supports Windows Hello login, providing secure and convenient facial recognition for quick access.

settings.title: Premium Sound Experience: Bang & Olufsen with Integrated Mic
settings.description: The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9’s high-end Bang & Olufsen sound system with a built-in microphone ensures clear communication and enhances multimedia experiences.

settings.title: Advanced Video and Security Features for Professionals
settings.description:
The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 boasts a 5MP IR camera designed to enhance virtual meetings and telehealth consultations.

Camera Highlights:

  • 5MP Resolution: Ensures high-definition video for clear and detailed visuals.
  • Auto-Framing: Keeps users centered in the frame during dynamic video calls.
  • IR Sensor: Supports Windows Hello for secure, password-free login.
  • Privacy Shutter: Includes a physical shutter for added privacy and security.

settings.title: Efficient Thermal Management for Enhanced Performance
settings.description: HP Vaporforce Thermals keep the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 cool under intense computational loads, ensuring reliable performance. This advanced cooling system is essential for maintaining system stability during critical diagnostic tasks. By effectively dissipating heat, it prevents overheating, which is crucial for optimal performance and reliability. This thermal management ensures that the workstation remains stable and efficient, even during demanding workloads, supporting smooth operation and preventing interruptions in high-performance applications.

settings.title: Extensive Connectivity for Enhanced Productivity
settings.description:
The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 offers versatile connectivity options with multiple Thunderbolt 4 ports, USB-C, HDMI, and an SD card reader. These ports ensure seamless integration with various medical imaging equipment and peripherals, enhancing the workstation's utility in diverse medical settings.

01. Power Connector
02. Thunderbolt 4 with USB4 Type-C
03. Thunderbolt 4 with USB4 Type-C
04. mDP port
05. HDMI port
06. SD 7.0 Card Reader
07. SmartCard Reader
08. Headphone/Microphone combo
09. Super Speed USB Type-A 5Gbps
10. Super Speed USB Type-A 5Gbps
11. RJ-45 Ethernet Port
12. Nano Security Lock Slot

settings.title: Compact Dimensions and Lightweight for Easy Transport
settings.description:
The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 offers a sleek and compact design, combined with powerful performance, making it ideal for professionals on the move.

Key Features:

  • Dimensions: 14.29 x 9.52 x 1.12 inches (363 x 250 x 286 mm)
  • Weight: Starting at just 5.27 lbs (2.4 kg)
  • Portability: Highly portable, perfect for healthcare professionals needing a mobile workstation
  • Performance: Despite its slim profile, it delivers robust performance for demanding medical applications

    This blend of portability and power ensures the ZBook Fury 16 G9 is a great choice for users who need both high performance and easy transportability.

settings.title: Experience Enhanced Cooling Efficiency
settings.content: HP Vaporforce Thermals ensure the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 remains cool under heavy computational loads. This advanced cooling system is crucial for maintaining reliable performance during critical diagnostic procedures, preventing overheating and ensuring system stability.

settings.title: Advanced Video and Security Features for Professionals
settings.content:
The HP Zbook Fury 16 G9 features a high-quality 5MP IR camera with advanced auto-framing capabilities, enhancing the user experience during virtual meetings and telehealth consultations.

Camera Highlights:

  • 5MP Resolution: Delivers high-definition video quality, ensuring clear and detailed images for virtual consultations and collaborative meetings.
  • Auto-Framing: Utilizes intelligent software to keep the user centered in the frame, particularly useful during dynamic video calls where the user might move around, as the camera automatically adjusts to keep the user in focus.
  • IR Sensor: Supports Windows Hello facial recognition, allowing for secure and quick login without the need for passwords.
  • Privacy Shutter: Includes a physical shutter to cover the camera when not in use, ensuring privacy and security against unauthorized access.

settings.title: Exceptional Service & Support from Monitors.com
settings.content:
When you purchase from Monitors.com, you not only receive a top-tier medical workstations and diagnostic monitors but also benefit from our dedication to value and service. We understand the unique needs of healthcare professionals, and that's why we offer:


Advanced Hot Swap: Our Hot Swap capabilities ensure you can seamlessly switch out components without workflow disruption, guaranteeing uninterrupted productivity.

Next Business Day Standard Replacement: Count on our swift replacement service to keep your workstation running smoothly, minimizing downtime.

Free Shipping & Fast Delivery: We respect your time, offering free shipping and lightning-fast delivery to get you started with your workstation without delay.

Dedicated Support Team: Our team of experts is readily available to address any inquiries or issues, making your journey from purchase to setup as seamless as possible.

Competitive Pricing: At Monitors.com, we're committed to delivering exceptional value. You'll find our products competitively priced to fit comfortably within your budget.

Customer Satisfaction: Your contentment is our top priority, and we're dedicated to ensuring you're thrilled with your purchase. We're here to assist you at every step.

Invest in a Monitors.com workstation for not just top-tier hardware but a partnership committed to your success.
